definition: regular and thorough (idiom); methodically arranged
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
(negative prefix)/not/no
involved/tangled/disorderly/confused/chaotic/Taiwan pr. [wen4]

sentences.english: He is very methodical in His work, doing everything by rule.
sentences.chinese: 他做事有条不紊，每件事情都是按规则做的。

sentences.english: Good interpersonal skills, disciplined, attention to details, well organized.
sentences.chinese: 良好的沟通能力，遵纪守法，注重细节，有条不紊。

sentences.english: She organizes her lectures well and appeals to the students.
sentences.chinese: 她讲课有条不紊，深受学生欢迎。

sentences.english: She must have been well disciplined for her orderliness.
sentences.chinese: 她有条不紊，一定受过良好的训练。
进一步的工程研究正有条不紊地进行。

sentences.english: A way of thinking rationally and methodically.
sentences.chinese: 理性的，有条不紊的一个方法。

sentences.english: At present, the new leadership group is conducting the work in a sorted-out manner.
sentences.chinese: 现在，新一届中央领导集体正有条不紊地开展工作。

sentences.english: We should take things in their proper order.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该有条不紊地处理事情。

sentences.english: Progressive muscle relaxation helps the body to systematically release tension, this means start at one point of your body and make it relax.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉间断松弛法就能使你的身体有条不紊地进行放松。

sentences.english: I am gentle, work methodically, is an individuality Gwynne and woman.
sentences.chinese: 我文静，做事有条不紊，是一个。

sentences.english: Taurean people tend to be slow, methodical, practical, and reserved.
sentences.chinese: 他们做事缓慢，有条不紊，讲究实际与有备无患。

sentences.english: Many people have noted that the Germans and English are both methodical and well-organized.
sentences.chinese: 许多人指出德国人和英国人做事有条不紊且组织严谨。

sentences.english: And what does this alphabetized life do for her?
sentences.chinese: 而这种有条不紊的生活带给了她什么好处呢？

sentences.english: All through that summer the work of the farm went like clockwork.
sentences.chinese: 整个夏天，庄园里的工作都进行的有条不紊。

sentences.english: He was determined to be informed and methodical about the process.
sentences.chinese: 他决定要暸解整个训练流程并有条不紊地进行。

definition: everything clear and in good order (idiom); neat and tidy
to follow the prescribed order; to keep to the working routine (idiom)
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
calm/unruffled
(of the people in a group) to get into position (idiom)/(athletics) On your mark!
arrangement/order/tidiness
in perfect order
calm and unhurried (idiom); composed/to take matters calmly
neither too fast nor too slow (idiom)
with single-hearted devotion (idiom)
rushed and muddled
lit. fight minutes, snatch seconds (idiom); a race against time/making every second count
steadily/a steady pace
in full swing (idiom)/(in a) frenzy/buzzing with activity
